skillTree.localised_description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
The unnatural Winds carry his words still. His voice now carries those selfsame winds that push entire armies ever forward.
Every time Skarr claws his way back from the dead, a little more burns away, until only the fury remains.
Skulls so innumerable that, were they dust, they would be a wasteland. All Skarr's doing.
Both 'blunt' and 'instrument' are, in fact, misnomers. Yet, a scalpel it is not; that much is true.
Skaramor Chieftains come and go. Their leader is but one… er, man.

effects.description:
Armour: +15 for Marauders of Khorne, Skullreapers and Wrathmongers units
	(own army)

Passive ability: "Rage" for Marauders of Khorne, Skullreapers and Wrathmongers units
	(own army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Marauders of Khorne, Skullreapers and Wrathmongers units

skillTree.localised_description: In the lulls between slaughters, the flaming tornado of Skarr's blades is still seen from afar. He would snuff out the very Winds, if he could.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from his mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit. (Maximum intensity at 150 kills)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

items.colour_text: Only the strong have a chance of withstanding Skarr's Bloodstorm Blades. From his blood-dimmed point of view, none fall under that category.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Skarr Bloodwrath has died numerous times, always to be brought back to life through the spilled blood of his foes to reap such a tally of skulls that none can keep count.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit. (Maximum intensity at 150 kills)

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Skullreapers and Wrathmongers units
	(Hero's army)
